replies.author: Atlantis
replies.txt_content:
aa210063654 发表于 2012-9-16 10:07 
- -刚刚撸Mc回来
把你的.bat,就是启动服务器那个东西的内容贴出来
cat > craftbukkit.sh << EOF
#!/bin/sh
BINDIR=$(dirname "$(readlink -fn "$0")")
cd "$BINDIR"
java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar
EOF
chmod +x craftbukkit.sh
